dict.acceptation: （意思上）指向；削尖；加标点于；指路；

sent.orig: By studying the point-to-point comparison method author presented a new algorithm based on point-to-point comparison method.
sent.trans: 通过对逐点比较法的研究，在逐点比较法的基础上提出了一种基于逐点比较法的新算法。

sent.orig: It includes: the potentiometric double-point titration, polarographic double-point titration and coulometric double-point titration.
sent.trans: 内容包括：电位双点滴定法、极谱双点滴定法和库仑双点滴定法。

sent.orig: Shoulder to bust point: measure from the side neck point to the bust point.
sent.trans: 肩至胸点的距离：量度从劲侧点到胸点的距离。

sent.orig: Or to set point of all or maybe to point where everything crosses Point of gravity?
sent.trans: 还是指定地点？或者可能到所有建筑的交叉处？（重心）？

sent.orig: A point-to-point link, the main task of which is to transport data from point to another.
sent.trans: 一种点到点链路，主要的任务是将数据从一点传输到另一点。
